website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling kit that provides numerous ways for kids to create as well as an inexpensive option for parents.
pros: Packed with things to do to create "Shrinky Dinks."
Includes 51 pieces for coloring, painting, making magnets, key chains, and more
cons: Requires parental assistance to "shrink" the characters
Pieces are somewhat small, but kids don't seem to mind
Some kits were missing pieces upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: The back of the box says it contains 21 precut ...
customer_reviews.text: The back of the box says it contains 21 precut shrinky dinks, 8 colored pencils, 6 pipe cleaners, 2 key chains and 6 magnets. The box came slightly squished (expected in shipping) and taped shut. There were no pipe cleaners, key chains or magnets. Just the shrinky dinks and pencils. I’d return but this was a gift from ‘Santa’ and my 7 year old doesn’t realize he’s been jipped however I feel differently now having to run out and purchase items that should have already been included to make these things have a purpose. Are ‘ALEX toys’ used??? I won’t purchase again from this seller unless they do the right thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 7 y/o, but the whole family plus any and all friends who came over during the holiday week got in on the fun. This was something I remembered doing as a child, and it was really fun to share that with them. I'm talking ages ranging from 7 up to 44, and nearly everything in between. We all got a kick out of these things. They do curl while they're baking, but wait a few more seconds and they'll flatten back out. THEN take them out of the oven. Super easy and really fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: T. Larkins

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: A classic.My four year old adores making these. I now find shrinkie dinks in all my pockets, my shoes, couch cushions, bathroom counters, on the stairs...at least they are cute. These are still less obnoxious than perler beads, which are the devil.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Duyck

customer_reviews.title: My five year old son LOVES these ... They're like magic and they're helping hone his fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.text: These are great!!! I purchased them for my five year old son to work on his coloring motor skills ... HE LOVES THEM! He was fascinated to watch them shrink through the oven door. He realized that the more detailed and the more color he puts on before they bake, the better they look ... JUST what I was looking for - I'll be buying more! Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: CS NottinghamTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love shrinky dinks, but a package of shrink film doesn't make a very impressive gift. This is the second set I bought like this... the previous one was geared toward girls and this one I bought as a gift for a boy. The packaging is appealing and for the price I think it makes a very nice birthday gift that will be fun to use. Great rainy day activity.
customer_reviews.author: Leaf Lady

customer_reviews.title: Definitely makes cool stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for Christmas gifts, and the kids loved them! They opened them right up and started making cool things. It does require some adult help, but I loved that they came pre-cut out. We have gotten a few of these sets, and this one is the most kid friendly we have gotten. I got them on a good sale, and it was definitely worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Ada Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly and fun! (adults must bake however)
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than similar products from the 90’s. They’re all pre-cut (yay) making them user friendly for my 3 and 5 year old grands. They don’t even have to be pro at coloring with the colored pencils as once they shrink, colors are enhanced and you don’t see the imperfections. My grandkids had a ball with them and I’ll buy again. These make a great inexpensive gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, cheap, screen-free time for kids! I thought I followed the instructions, but when they started curling in the oven I panicked and took them out too early. Have faith, leave them in a little longer, and they will straighten out. My kids loved playing with these! Definitely end up really small and get lost easily though.
customer_reviews.author: Camrie Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for my 8 yr old soon and he loved them. He stayed busy coloring them (and out ...
customer_reviews.text: I remember wanting these as a kid and never got them. Bought them for my 8 yr old soon and he loved them. He stayed busy coloring them (and out of my way) then we both watched them through the oven door just like the kids in the commercial when I was a kid. It was a fun experience to have with my son. He was impressed that these were around when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: TayMN

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Just as I remembered from when I was a child. We followed instructions, put them in the oven and they shrunk as they should in just a few minutes. My 2 1/2 year old grandson liked watching them shrink. We put the magnets on the back that were included and stuck them on the fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: As good as they've always been.
customer_reviews.text: Fun product just like when I was a kid! I bought these for my nephew for Christmas and he had a lot of fun coloring them and playing once they were cooked. The little magnets work well. The stands you can use are a bit generic, but they work alright. The pieces do shrink up and are sturdy though. I had fun doing some with him.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: After ordering some Shrinky Dinks for my 4 yo for Christmas and then hoarding the entire activity myself, I found that I really love these things. I bought special colored pencils and make these after the kids have gone to bed. I have a shrinky dink keychain. For some reason, its extremely satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: J. Delgadillo

customer_reviews.title: As to be expected
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would have saves some material and not made the packaging so big but as far as the product i love it! I used to do this as a child and this was for my son (3 Years Old) and he loves it! they are quick to do so he doesn't loos interest
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Different set came.
customer_reviews.text: Fun little set for my kids. Only thing is the one pictured didn't come, instead a different one with similar but different pictures. Only has 21 tiny ones to color.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Always a Treat To Shrinky Dink!
customer_reviews.text: The review is really about the fun I had sharing an old favorite art-and-craft with a new generation. I had just as much fun making "Shrinky Dinks" at 44 with my 6 and 8 year old nieces as I did when I was a kid. I would highly recommend the product and the experience to anyone interested in a) feeling like a kid again, b) teaching younger kids how things work, and/or c) you just want to get back into your arts-n-crafts groove again.
customer_reviews.author: Carina Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and works really well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my little cousin who is 9. He did it right away and the kit was easy and worked really well! Would be nicer if it came with string to hang the ones with holes or small magnets to glue on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn C

customer_reviews.title: Good but Small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these out of nostalgia. I loved them as a child and wanted to share the experience with my nephew. They work fine and are exactly like the ones I remember from the 80's. My only complaint is the size-they are sooo small.
customer_reviews.author: Meeahcagee

customer_reviews.title: This is a great and fun project for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and fun project for kids. My daughter who is now a mom, loved them as a kid and now her daughters love them. A blast from the past! I was able to buy these as an add-on and the price was more than reasonable. My order arrived as promised, just in time for my granddaughters 5th birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Nanacooper522

customer_reviews.title: Favorite childhood memory relived.
customer_reviews.text: Activity set includes everything required for an afternoon of fun! More more advanced than what I was used to as a child and includes accessories such as pipe cleaners, chains to make keychains and prop stands.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: These do not work
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions did not work. Curled up even when I changed temp to see if that was the problem. Don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Cute but tiny
customer_reviews.text: Do you shrink up to tiny little things and frankly there's really nothing to do with him once you make them. I think shrink he dinks are way overpriced and my grandson was done after the first time
customer_reviews.author: MeeMaw Terry

customer_reviews.title: How fun?!
customer_reviews.text: What a unique take on a classic craft. Bought this for my artsy nephew for Christmas and can't wait to see his reaction. It has so many fun ideas and it still such an easy craft as I remember when I was little.
customer_reviews.author: Mary LGKT

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Loved as a kid, hope my son loves them too. Haven't tried them out yet but they came in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for any age
customer_reviews.text: 2 afternoons of fun for the kids. Will order more. Easy directions, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Borkleelin

customer_reviews.title: Best gift we gave this year...
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the funnest gifts we gave this year for Christmas. We gave these to our grandkids and all of the adults nearly hijacked them from the kids. Shrinks Dinks are still as fun to play with as when we were kids 30+ years ago. Get some!
customer_reviews.author: Heath M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: I had these when I was a kid! Gave this to my 7 year old son for Christmas. He loved doing it as did his aunt (19), brother (13), and sister (6). Will definitely buy more sets!
customer_reviews.author: soriondee

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay....but not many dinks
customer_reviews.text: It was a fun little project to do with the kids. Overall I thought that the pencils included did not color well on the plastic....and that this item was over-priced as there was very few (and small) dinks in the package.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schmitzer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these things are tiny. They are tiny before you bake them & about the size of the tip of your finger once baked. No real purpose for them after baking and too small to really paint. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: pdharrell

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to be able to share a part of my childhood with my son. He loves them. They work just how I remember.
customer_reviews.author: c.rea.97.85

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: My son wishes the pieces weren't set to what you could make each one into. You should get to choose which one to make a keychain or put on a stand instead of it being predetermined.
customer_reviews.author: KimmerAnn

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Shrinky Dinks
customer_reviews.text: These are ok shrinky dink’s, but I gave them 4 stars because they are so tiny when they shrink up. My 8-year-old boys used this once & then lost interest.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Three generations playing with shrinky dinks!!
customer_reviews.text: who doesnt love shrinky dinks??? Im 48 and had these as a kid, My 24 and 26 year old had them and now im having fun with my 5 year old grandson. Its awesome to be able to share a part of your own childhood with grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Forlornmyth

customer_reviews.title: Great busy activity for boys and girls!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for either boys or girls! My 5yr old daughter and 4yr old son loved them and were entertained with them for a couple of hours, which is amazing! I love that they come with practical ways to use them, too, like as a magnet or a keychain. I will order these again!
customer_reviews.author: Diana R Beck

customer_reviews.title: They're fun
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loved these as a kid so I bought these for my grandson He had fun coloring them, watching them cook and then the final product.
customer_reviews.author: A Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Need adult for small children since u bake them
customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old was amazed with these ..will def order more from Amazon u can not find in stores anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So very fun!
customer_reviews.text: So very fun! My kids and I were definitely entertained with these for an afternoon. I used my own pencils. I didn't think this came with many options. Your kids will enjoy them!
customer_reviews.author: Misty McClaskey

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great price!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I had a great time with this. Very easy to use, came out incredible. Company shipped immediately. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Weihs

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: These are so much fun! They look great after being colored & baked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit Christmas Day. My adult kids and grandkids had a blast! None of them had ever heard of shrinky dink’s!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Persinger

customer_reviews.title: Memories!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter remembers playing with these as a child. She & granddaughter had a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Ann G. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My son received them for Christmas and absolutely loves them. They work perfect and truly are a fun project to work on together.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: This pack is very boyish not gender neutral
customer_reviews.text: Not what i expected mainly boyish but i hope my niece still likes them. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Hymer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to do with my son. These are fun
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot of fun for my 4 year old and 10 year old. We were surprised at how small they ended up. Leave them in long enough or the results won't be optimal.
customer_reviews.author: patricia Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute! 5 year old son had a blast coloring then cooking to watch them shrink. Not messy. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel R.

customer_reviews.title: Fun inexpensive craft
customer_reviews.text: Fun for all ages - both me and my 11 y.o. had fun with this. For less than five dollars (Amazon sale price), this kit is an awesome value, as there are at least 20 different shapes included, as well as the colored pencils, pipe cleaners, and magnents. And unlike traditional shrinky dinks, these are pre-cut shapes (sooo helpful), and the holes for pipe cleaners and such are also pre-cut. We shrank them in the toaster oven, but you can also use a traditional oven. Would buy again for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: sb043

customer_reviews.title: The kids absolutely loved these. These were perfect to make on a ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids absolutely loved these. These were perfect to make on a rainy day. The kids thought it was the best thing ever. Just color them in and shrink them in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: sandyego

customer_reviews.title: So little
customer_reviews.text: Cool little but of nostalgia for the grandkids to play with
customer_reviews.author: benjamin a isbell

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these. Didn't take too much help from me to make the so that is a win
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Fun! Great different varieties of different characters to color...my 6 year old loved them! I had fun myself 😃
customer_reviews.author: brian engebos

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids and teens, and easy to shrink.
customer_reviews.text: Used this at a Christmas party activity, kids and teens enjoyed it, and was very easy to shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Logue

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I am missing MOST of the kit
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I am missing MOST of the kit. It only came with the shinky dinks and colored pencils- no keychains, magnets, stands, pipe cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W

customer_reviews.title: Timeless fun!
customer_reviews.text: I loved shrinky dinks when I was a child and now my kids love them too. My 6 year old and his friend had so much fun working on these tonight. They shrink so quickly in the oven that the kids really enjoy watching all the action. My only complaint is that some of the holes closed up too small for the little chain that comes w/the kit to fit through.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: He was able to work on his fine motor skills and see magic
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find these! It was a hit for my 4 year old nephew! He was able to work on his fine motor skills and see magic. It came with an assortment of shrinky dinks from little bugs to his favorites, dinosaurs! We turned on the light in the oven and he watched it shrink. He thought it was magical. I plan on buying more for him to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Medrano

customer_reviews.title: These don't turn out like the directions say they will
customer_reviews.text: These don't turn out like the directions say they will. My grandkids still have fun making them. I have followed the directions very carefully and they still curl up and end up shaped rather strangely.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Foster

customer_reviews.title: Good variety of pieces to color and shrink
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson. He thought they were "cool". Good variety of pieces to color and shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Janet V.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for my toddler and I to do
customer_reviews.text: So much fun for my toddler and I to do. He loves watching them shrink and it's great rainy day activity. I bought other sets too we loved them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Linnea Covington

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a 6 year old and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Kids had fun..
customer_reviews.text: Kids had fun...they don't shrink flat. One of them broke. I followed the directions exactly. Cool idea if they worked correctly!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool set
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool set, good for boys. My son loved watching things shrink in the oven!! Kept him entertained on a few bad-weather days this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ashlynn

customer_reviews.title: Fun from the past
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I like to buy at least one silly gift for my daughter's birthday and this year it was Shrinky Dinks! Even though Shrinky Dinks have been around since the mid to late 70's, they are still fun no matter what age you are!
customer_reviews.author: LouLou

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Cute cute cute! Always love these even when I was young...I’m 47 now! My children now love them!

customer_reviews.title: Great activity
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun worked well in toaster oven I recommend using sharpie or other Permanent Parker’s
customer_reviews.author: butterfly

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: This toy was PERFECT! My kids, ages 2 1/2, 5 1/2, and 7 1/2 had a BLAST with it. It comes with everything you need. It is inexpensive. It entertained them for about two hours. Couldn't have asked for anything better. Perfect craft for Christmas vacation from school. Will buy more- and I will try to make it this brand because the quality was great.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: a nice trip down memory
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were a lot cooler than my son. Maybe because I played with these when I was a kid, a nice trip down memory lane
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: way cool time to share generations!!
customer_reviews.text: this a fun craft for adult and kids to share.....needed toaster oven or regular oven to be shrunk. come with color pencils...
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: great gift for any child
customer_reviews.text: awesome got for my 6 year old grand daughter will give her and her parents something to do while spending time together and will help inspire her creativity I think could be categorized as learning toy as uses hand eye coordination as well as creativity
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Fun to now be doing Shrinky Dinks with my granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun to now be doing Shrinky Dinks with my granddaughter after having so much fun with them with my children. Good prices
customer_reviews.author: Nita M.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun assortment of shrinky dinks to color, kept my son busy for hours.

customer_reviews.title: Shrinky Dinks
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves to make these and will play with them for hours.

customer_reviews.title: Clear directions! Very fun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! We were able to use our own pens and pencils too.
customer_reviews.author: BenViewed

customer_reviews.title: Great classic craft/toy that entertained my 9 yr old for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great classic craft/toy that entertained my 9 yr old for an entire afternoon! Other than a little supervision with the toaster oven, he was able to do this all on his own and really, really enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: My boys love these! Fun to color and then
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these! Fun to color and then watch them shrink! Make sure to poke a hole in the top before you shrink them if you want to make a necklace or hang them on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: good for afternoon craft
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the kids to do for an afternoon activity during summer. They loved it. They enjoyed making the necklaces and keychain out of them
customer_reviews.author: bryan burks

customer_reviews.title: Shrinky Dinks success
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic experience for the price. FUN and educational. You will love Shrinky Dinks and so will the kids! My grandchildren, age 5 and 7, spent over an hour coloring and then baking their creations. No odor or harmful chemicals as the change is physical, not chemical. We even looked up the chemical information on the plastic in Shrinky Dinks. A few chains to hang on back pack or as a key chain and small magnets are included. My grandchildren want another set. You can't get a better recommendation than kids asking for more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: How can you go wrong with a classic like these? Kids loved them
customer_reviews.author: Daria T.

customer_reviews.title: Sentimental fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my daughter for sentimental reasons. They were just as awesome as I remember as a child.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA HAYES

customer_reviews.title: Just like I remember!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these online when looking for Christmas presents for my 6 yo son. I remembered them from when I was a kid and they are just as much fun now as they were back then! We spent quality time together coloring them and watching them shrink in our toaster oven...only takes a minute or so. The holes that are already in them make them easy to create keychain decorations or "bracelets" with the pipe cleaners (included). Also, the addition of tiny magnets in with the kit are great for 'fridge decor. Will buy another set in a different design for his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Curly Girly

customer_reviews.title: Shrinking is fun!
customer_reviews.text: My son wasn’t very excited when he opened this gift on Christmas, but after shrinking his first few creations he’s changed his tune. He loved watching them shrink in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Love Shrinky Dinks
customer_reviews.text: Shrinky Dinks were one of my 4 year old grandsons favorite Christmas gifts. I love creating and spending time with him and Shrinky Dinks are perfect for that!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin White

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my five year old son and they were a huge hit. Hadn't done Shrinky Dinks since I was a kid and it was just as much fun as an adult. This set has lots of cool figures for little boys. My boys were really pleased with the ones that came with a hole & chain. There were a ton in this little box and kept them occupied for a long time. We will be ordering more for Christmas stockings!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Marlatt

customer_reviews.title: Very tiny peices but still a good activity
customer_reviews.text: My Boys liked this but some pieces are so tiny you can't really do anything with them. But for the price it was a fun project

customer_reviews.title: re-live the 80's
customer_reviews.text: These were cool in the 80's, and kids still like them.

customer_reviews.text: So great to share something I loved as a kid with mine. They opened them immediately and colored 30!! They couldn’t stop. It was lots of fun! Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Hooray, Shrinky Dinks!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for crafty projects to do with my son on the weekends (3.5 years old), and these are a big hit. There are many individual shrinky dinks, so he, I, and his father can each do one at a sitting, and the kit lasts for many sessions. He (and I) love watching them shrink up in our toaster oven. I love it!

customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son and I had a blast doing these over a snowed in weekend.

customer_reviews.text: Both of my kids loved making these. I have a 7yr old boy and girl. They asked when I will be buying more.

customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 4 year old and I do together. He's not the best colorer, but it's a classic and they are fun. The finished product is cute!

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: I remember when I was a kid getting these. Loved them, still do. Uses craftyness not just thumbs

customer_reviews.text: Fun set that the kids enjoyed. They are easy to color and easy instructions for shrinking them. Colored pencils are included. Used with kids age 9 and under.

customer_reviews.title: Fun activity for my 6 and 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I remember these from my childhood so I purchased some to do with my 6 and 3 year old. They loved it! I plan to buy more packs.

customer_reviews.title: They had so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Brings you back to your childhood. My friend came over with her kids (age range 6-11) for a play date with my 4 yr old. I brought this out and the rest of the day was all about coloring and shrinking their shrinky dinks! They had so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Meegan A. Ratner

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Loved the variety and ease of use!! The price was the best I could find for what came in the box!! We LOVE shrinky dinks!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny A. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Best easy craft/gift
customer_reviews.text: Best easy craft/gift! My kids loved coloring these, seeing them shrink & then making them into keychains or little standing toys.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 5,and 6 year old boys!
customer_reviews.text: My kids had so much fun with these! A big hit! They loved watching them shrink in the oven! It's like a science/art project, with quick results! My boys dont love to color pictures, but they were excited to color the shrinkydinks!
customer_reviews.author: A. McStyle

product_meta.title: Shrinky Dinks Cool Stuff Activity Set Kids Art and Craft Activity
product_meta.description: Style:SingleShrinky Dinks Cool Stuff Activity Set is an awesome way to spend a day indoors! Color, bake and shrink a bat, monster truck, eyeball, alien, insects and more. Shrinky Dinks sheets are made of a special thin, flexible plastic which, when heated in an oven, shrink and harden without altering their color or shape. We precut all the fun shapes in every one of our kits to make them easy to work with! Includes 21 preprinted and precut Shrinky Dinks, 8 color pencils, 8 stands, 6 pipe cleaners, 2 key chains, 6 magnets and easy instructions. Recommended for children 5 years of age and older.
feature_bullets: Color, bake and shrink a dinosaur, robot, shark, space ship and more
Make figurines, magnets and key chains
Includes 21 preprinted and precut Shrinky Dinks, 8 color pencils, 8 stands, 6 pipe cleaners, 2 key chains, 6 magnets and easy instructions
Recommended for children 5 years of age and older
